name: Play it again Sam 9
overview: A compilation of 4 games: Camelot (aka Quest 2) a single player arcade adventure featuring 60 screens. It was written by Tony Oakden and was first published in this compilation The Life of Repton a single player scrolling maze game. It was a standalone update of Repton 3 with 40 new screens. It was written by Matthew Atkinson and was originally released in 1987 by Superior/Acornsoft. Spycat a single player arcade adventure featuring 100 screens of puzzles and enemies. It was written by Peter Scott and Dylan and was originally released in 1988 by Superior/Acornsoft. Steve Davis Snooker a snooker simulation for 1 or 2 players, the 2nd player being either a friend or Steve Davis (the computer). It was developed by CDS and was originally released in 1985 by CDS.
